title: Trump Branded Merchandise Grift - $600 Million
summary: Trump reaped $600 million from selling Bibles, fragrances, shoes, NFTs, and other branded products in 2024 while running for president. Golden 'Never Surrender' sneakers sold for $399-$499. 'God Bless the USA Bible' for $59.99 - described as 'the only Bible endorsed by President Trump.' Trump-branded digital trading cards (NFTs) for $99 each. Capitalized on Georgia indictment by promoting NFTs featuring his booking photo. Also sold watches ($2.8M), cologne, and $3M 'Save America' coffee table book.
